subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: West Indies revived their World Twenty20 title defense as Dwayne Smith hit a sparkling 72 and the bowlers wrecked host Bangladesh to secure a 73-run victory in Mirpur.
snippet: West Indies revived their World Twenty20 title defense as Dwayne Smith hit a sparkling 72 and the bowlers wrecked host Bangladesh to secure a 73-run victory in Mirpur.
